fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Member Lifetime Value by Join Year
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to perform cohort analysis by calculating average lifetime value for members grouped by their join year.

InputDefinition.userMessage: Calculate the average lifetime value (total revenue generated) for members grouped by the year they joined, and show how this has changed over time in a chart. When I click on a year, show me a pie chart breaking down revenue by type (membership fees, events, courses). Then let me click a pie slice to see the actual members and transactions.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes line/bar chart showing lifetime value by join year
Clicking year shows pie chart of revenue breakdown by type
Clicking pie slice shows detailed member and transaction table
All levels of drill-down work correctly
Transaction table allows opening individual invoice/member records
